LanguageData.AccuracyTouch.label: 命中精度(至近距離)
LanguageData.AccuracyTouch.description: The weapon's effect on accuracy at a distance of 4 cells or less.
LanguageData.AccuracyShort.label: 命中精度(近距離)
LanguageData.AccuracyShort.description: The weapon's effect on accuracy at a distance of 15 cells.
LanguageData.AccuracyMedium.label: 命中精度(中距離)
LanguageData.AccuracyMedium.description: The weapon's effect on accuracy at a distance of 30 cells.
LanguageData.AccuracyLong.label: 命中精度(遠距離)
LanguageData.AccuracyLong.description: The weapon's effect on accuracy at a distance of 50 cells or more.
LanguageData.RangedWeapon_Cooldown.label: クールダウン時間(遠距離武器)
LanguageData.RangedWeapon_Cooldown.description: この武器を一度使った後に必要な、待たなければならない時間です。
